name: codecast
description: Live-streaming code app with integrated terminal and remote file viewing
author: Spencer Shupe, Benji Leboe, Erik Mackie, Jeff Pang

scripts.update-all: concurrently 'npm update' 'npm update --prefix server' 'npm update --prefix client'
scripts.install-all: concurrently 'npm install' 'npm install --prefix server' 'npm install --prefix client' 'npm install --prefix electronapp' 'chmod 777 electronapp/npm_install.sh' './electronapp/npm_install.sh'
scripts.electron-start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'npm run server' 'wait-on https://arcane-thicket-82509.herokuapp.com/ && npm run electron'
